data.market_trends: Rise in adventure tourism, with an increase in winter sports participation and cultural tourism seeing steady growth.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers tend to book last-minute for winter trips, especially for Christmas season trips.
data.competitive_landscape: Other Scandinavian countries compete on outdoor adventures; Finland's unique offerings make it stand out during winter.
data.seasonal_factors: Attractive during winter due to snow for both adventure and relaxation activities.
